author: cnbc.com
title: Federal Home Loan Bank of New York Declares A 6.50% Dividend For The First Quarter Of 2018
text:
NEW YORK, May 24, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Federal Home Loan Bank of New York ("FHLBNY") is pleased to announce that, on May 24, 2018, its Board of Directors approved a dividend for the first quarter of 2018 of 6.50% (annualized). The dollar amount of the dividend will be approximately $105.3 million. The cash dividend will be distributed to member financial institutions on May 25, 2018.
"Our cooperative has performed well to start 2018, with strong earnings and the solid performance of our core business throughout the first quarter," said José R. González, president and CEO of the FHLBNY. "These results position the Federal Home Loan Bank of New York to enhance member value by providing an attractive dividend for the quarter."
The FHLBNY filed its Form 10-Q for the first quarter of 2018 with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on May 9, 2018.
Federal Home Loan Bank of New York
The Federal Home Loan Bank of New York is a Congressionally chartered, wholesale Bank. It is part of the Federal Home Loan Bank System, a national wholesale banking network of 11 regional, stockholder-owned banks. As of March 31, 2018, the FHLB of New York serves 325 financial institutions in New Jersey, New York, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The Federal Home Loan Banks support the efforts of local members to help provide financing for America's homebuyers.
